comment.text: Works for me! Can't test aarch64 though...

bugs.title: icecat does not compile on aarch64

bugzilla.short_desc: icecat does not compile on aarch64

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
Executing /builddir/build/BUILD/icecat-45.7.0/icecat-objdir/dist/bin/xpcshell -g /builddir/build/BUILD/icecat-45.7.0/icecat-objdir/dist/bin/ -a /builddir/build/BUILD/icecat-45.7.0/icecat-objdir/dist/bin/ -f /builddir/build/BUILD/icecat-45.7.0/toolkit/mozapps/installer/precompile_cache.js -e precompile_startupcache("resource://gre/");
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/builddir/build/BUILD/icecat-45.7.0/toolkit/mozapps/installer/packager.py", line 406, in <module>
    main()
  File "/builddir/build/BUILD/icecat-45.7.0/toolkit/mozapps/installer/packager.py", line 400, in main
    args.source, gre_path, base)
  File "/builddir/build/BUILD/icecat-45.7.0/toolkit/mozapps/installer/packager.py", line 161, in precompile_cache
    errors.fatal('Error while running startup cache precompilation')
  File "/builddir/build/BUILD/icecat-45.7.0/python/mozbuild/mozpack/errors.py", line 103, in fatal
    self._handle(self.FATAL, msg)
  File "/builddir/build/BUILD/icecat-45.7.0/python/mozbuild/mozpack/errors.py", line 98, in _handle
    raise ErrorMessage(msg)
mozpack.errors.ErrorMessage: Error: Error while running startup cache precompilation
make[1]: *** [/builddir/build/BUILD/icecat-45.7.0/toolkit/mozapps/installer/packager.mk:41: stage-package] Error 1
make[1]: Leaving directory '/builddir/build/BUILD/icecat-45.7.0/icecat-objdir/browser/installer'

Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable):
icecat-45.7.0

How reproducible:
Always on Fedora >= 26
